title: Revenue of the New England Patriots ( NFL ) 2001 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Revenue in million U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 18.
In general Revenue in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2013 and 2014.
Maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars, about 600.0 was reported at Year 2018
Minimum Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 136.0 was reached at Year 2001
